2.name: Cleopatra
2.description: The fabled queen of Egypt's affair with Roman general Marc Antony is ulimately disastrous for both of them.

3.name: Richard III
3.description: Richard of Gloucester uses manipulation and murder to gain the English throne.

4.name: La dame aux camélias

6.name: Pilgrim's Progress
6.description: Consists of two parts: Part One: The Life of John Bunyon (2 reels); Part Two: The Pilgrim's Progress (3 reels).

7.name: As You Like It
7.description: After the overthrowing of Duke Senior by his tyrannical brother, Senior's daughter Rosalind disguises herself as a man and sets out to find her banished father while also counseling her clumsy suitor Orlando in the art of wooing.

8.name: Satana
8.description: A four chapter film including Satan vs the Creator, Satan vs the Saviour, The Green Demon/Satan during the Dark Ages and The Red Demon/Satan in modern times.

9.name: Independenta Romaniei
9.description: The movie depicts the Romanian War of Independence (1877-1878).

10.name: Oliver Twist
10.description: An orphan in early 19th century England escapes the poorhouse only to fall among a gang of pickpockets in London.

19.name: De svarta maskerna
19.description: "The Black Masks", a secret political society, involves the beautiful agent Lydia to apprehend an important official document. Lieutenant von Muehlen is a trusted member of another secret society. He is on the same mission.

21.name: Lorna Doone
21.description: Yeoman loves outlaw's daughter, who is stolen heiress.

22.name: Samhällets dom
22.description: Harald steals money in order to pay a personal guarantee. The crime is discovered and he is sentenced to imprisonment. After the penalty is served he travels to America to begin a new life.

24.name: Oliver Twist
24.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

25.name: Dødsspring til hest fra cirkuskuplen
25.description: A melodrama about the destitute Count lured into a circus environment and forced to show their daring high up in the circus dome.

31.name: Die Kinder des Generals
31.description: Kind-hearted Thekla helps her frivolous brother and hides him on a remote farm.

45.description: An army sergeant befriends an orphan boy.
